Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40633 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-40633 affecting package giflib for versions less than 5.2.1-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package giflib is earlier than 5.2.1-10, affected by CVE-2021-40633
